properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 2 at 4:58AM AKST until February 4 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12
inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Juneau.

* WHEN...From Monday morning through late Monday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Heavy
snow could be difficult to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates likely late Monday
morning through Monday afternoon. Rain may begin to mix with
snow as temperatures begin to warm above freezing Monday
evening, which could lower snow totals.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT
